aircraft.value: Condor Tactical - AC-4730-317 at Training Center Beta

defect_observed.value: Autopilot disengagement without warning. Malfunction reported by flight crew.

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Electronic Warfare component. Testing confirmed performance below acceptable limits.

corrective_action.value: Revise maintenance procedure to include additional verification steps

remarks_investigation.value: Investigation completed as per established procedures. All findings documented.

remarks_design.value: Design review completed. No design modification required. Component replacement as per maintenance manual is adequate. Date: 29/10/2024 Authorized Signatory of Design: Wg Cdr B.P. Gupta

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Component inspection records verified. All quality parameters were within acceptable limits during manufacturing. Date: 31/10/2024 Signature: Air Cmde R.K. Joshi

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) User perspective considered. Recommend update to operating procedures based on lessons learned. Date: 01/11/2024 Signature: Gp Capt N.R. Kumar

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) Quality oversight review completed. Recommend monitoring effectiveness of implemented preventive actions. Date: 02/11/2024 Signature: Eng. R.P. Singh

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) Certification review completed. Proposed modifications do not affect type design approval. Acceptable. Date: 08/11/2024 Signature: Dr. P.L. Mehta

Centre for Military Airworthiness and Certification
FORM - 44
DEFECT INVESTIGATION REPORT FORMAT
Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Major
b) Defect Observed: Autopilot disengagement without warning. Malfunction reported by flight crew.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Age-related degradation of elastomeric components
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Electronic Warfare component. Testing
confirmed performance below acceptable limits.
c) Remedial Measures Revise maintenance procedure to include additional verification steps
i. Corrective Action:
ii. Preventive Action: Implement condition-based monitoring system
d) Attributable Code: R - Lapses on the part of Repair Agency/Manufacturer
